title: build: freebsd/arm is flaky (memory corruption?)
body:
Just on the front page of build.golang.org, I see:

https://build.golang.org/log/70def938cb56a09f6dff143b976a79340baa0e8f
https://build.golang.org/log/a3898e3eab6a2f7db95aef5388a04713feb4ac79
https://build.golang.org/log/4df567faa5ea973c2a05e985bb659d7bb2c26831
https://build.golang.org/log/45ec2ba0ebc6cf57eb80d764267f208d97a92a2a

These are all over the map and smell like memory corruption. Possibly related to #15658?

Does anyone have a freebsd/arm machine that they can do a stress test / bisection on? I fear it maybe 71ab9fa312f8266379dbb358b9ee9303cde7bd6b, but it'd be good to know more confidently before digging into that commit.
